radiographic_examinations.findings: Decreased lung volumes; moderate cardiomegaly; borderline diameter of the azygos vein; increased vascular diameters; bilateral perihilar haze; increased fluid in the interstitium; moderate pulmonary edema; minimal bilateral pleural effusions; no evident pneumonia.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Decrease in lung volumes noted compared to previous radiograph.
